metadata.name: PowerShell Script Change Permission Via Set-Acl - PsScript
metadata.comment: Detects PowerShell scripts set ACL to of a file or a folder

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('set-acl ')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-aclobject ')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-path ')))

output.summary: Detects PowerShell scripts set ACL to of a file or a folder
